idea:
Sanavi Agro Industries is an agricultural-based enterprise mainly with its presence in the field of dairy farming, Making products from cow dung. hi-tech agriculture. We started our journey in a humble manner with a medium-sized agricultural project in Palghar district in 2019.

The brand of "Sanavi Agro Industries" (SAI) is one of the first forms of fresh, one of the wholesome, desi (non-homogenate), and organic (preservative and chemical free), the concept of cow milk is common to man community in Palghar, Thane, Mumbai. Presented to fulfillment. Now it is a household name around Mumbai and it is liked by communities living with cow's milk.

Excellent quality and service is the motto of our company, which has determined our success and strong expansion in various agricultural-based activities. Please check our products/services and contact us for any further details.
name: Sanvi Agro Industries

idea: K.B.I. Fire and Security Pvt Ltd is an India based company providing automation solutions like fire alarm system, Cctv System, Face Detection using Cctv, Public Address System, Access Control System, Intrusion Detection, Under vehicle Surveillance System, Data Networking, Copper Networking, Fiber Networking(FTTH),Home Automation System, Building Automation System, Parking Management System to Home offices and large infrastructure
name: K.B.I. FIRE AND SECURITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
VISION

To provide a garden-variety online gallery for every economical class student’s despite being from highly remote areas to learn in all possible fields of education, art, culture, sports and more on pan India basis.


MISSION

To provide basic and advance knowledge in every field of learning through online classes from highly qualified functional faculty at very low and ground sensible fees.

AIM

To make such arrangements with schools and coaching’s so they can utilize our live lectures. To provide benefits to coaching institutions facing teacher crunch in remote areas. To provide live lectures to the mass at one time at one place that is your nearest centre.

OBJECTIVES

To provide all possible knowledge in all possible field to every education chasing students despite being from remote areas because we are somewhere between online and offline classes , we will provide best at least cost.
name: IUDCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Feather Worldwide is a company of talent, passion and courage, a company which leaves mark in various industries. Feather Worldwide are one of successful company with experience of almost a decade. We bring the talent, tools and technology together to create business strategy that captures the Alliance’s imagination. At Feather Worldwide, we understand the future of business because we are inventing it. Feather Worldwide has always been committed to supporting the corporate and their commitment. We are based on the idea that strategic philanthropy-giving that is guided by focused research, creative planning and thoughtful execution-is the most effective way to achieve meaningful results. To this end, the Feather Worldwide provides funding, volunteers, equipment and other forms of support for qualifying organizations or individual projects whose values are in line with the mandates. We create experiences that help to change the way people think, behave and perform. We provide effective and motivating business communications that engage, build understanding and increase performance. We offer great communications totally in line with your business needs.
name: Feather Worldwide

idea:
About us:

In an era where everyone sees their dreams in the motion picture, we The Phantasy films are working towards creating many such dreams, we are here to ignite the vision of the society with (adjective) content and best possible way to convert them in to motion picture. we are the team with the thought that cinema is not just a show biz but the best medium to channelize and guide to the path of betterment. Entertainment is not just the word but it is world within every member of this team!!!! When it comes to execute the dreams, our cinema reflects our vision. We are full fledged production company mainly specialists in making Big screen cinemas, Reality shows, web series, serials, Ad films, short films, Music videos, Corporate ads, Branding PR and Marketing, we love to make Cinema which you all love to watch!
name: Phantasy Films
